title: Oval Banneton Proofing Basket
description:
Oval Banneton Proofing Basket 11 3/4" long and approximately 3 3/4" deep and 4"wide.

If you are a baker, new to baking, or know a baker, this is the perfect baking tool. Make professional loaves with the help of proofing baskets.

-Great for shaping bread and essential for naturally-leavened bread baking!

-Rattan Basket with Removable Linen Liner.

-Basket and liner are both easy to clean by hand.

-Use with or without the liner!


We have a variety of sizes and different shapes as well--check our shop for other listings for bannetons.
If you'd like to order multiple baskets or a variety of proofing baskets, please reach out--we are happy to bundle the bannetons.
